statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement
SELECT email_address, engagement_type FROM customer_engagement
SELECT customer_id, engagement_date FROM customer_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE is_opened = TRUE
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Promotion'
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Email' AND is_opened = true ORDER BY engagement_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_engagement WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_engagements FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'SMS'
SELECT DISTINCT engagement_type FROM customer_engagement ORDER BY engagement_type
SELECT customer_id, email_address, engagement_type FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT email, loyalty_points FROM customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_logs WHERE email_opened = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.email, el.email_sent_at FROM customers c JOIN email_logs el ON c.customer_id = el.customer_id;
SELECT c.email, el.email_sent_at, el.email_opened FROM customers c JOIN email_logs el ON c.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE el.email_opened = TRUE;
SELECT c.email AS customer_email, el.email_sent_at AS sent_at FROM customers c LEFT JOIN email_logs el ON c.customer_id = el.customer_id ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_engagement WHERE opened_emails > 10;
SELECT email, opened_emails, clicked_links FROM customer_engagement ORDER BY opened_emails DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE status='active';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement JOIN email_campaigns ON customer_engagement.customer_id = email_campaigns.campaign_id
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_engagement WHERE opened_emails > 10
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_engagement WHERE opened_emails < clicked_links
SELECT * FROM campaign_results ORDER BY email_opened DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'participation' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, email_campaigns.campaign_name FROM customers JOIN email_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = email_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Email' AND engagement_result = 'Success' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM customers JOIN customer_engagement ON customers.customer_id = customer_engagement.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_engagements > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT email_id, customer_id, program_id, sent_date FROM emails_sent WHERE program_id = 2 ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT open_id, email_id, open_date FROM email_opened WHERE email_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, sent_date FROM emails_sent ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, program_name FROM customers JOIN loyalty_program ON customers.customer_id = loyalty_program.program_id;
SELECT email_id, open_date FROM email_opened WHERE open_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-01';
